actions.message:
=ticket (message)       THIS WILL CONTACT ALL THE ADMINS
=bugreport        Sends a bug report to bot creator
=ping              test the ping
=serverinfo
=Help            Lists available commands
=status           Gives off the discord bot status server
=GetAvatar              Sends the user's avatar image
=GetUserCard            Sends avatar with username on it
=GetImage [url]         Sends the image from the URL
=InvertImage [url]      Inverts the image linked in the URL
=RotateImage [url]      Rotates the image 120 degrees
=ResizeImage [url]      Shrinks the image by 50%
=poll (yes/no question)     Makes a poll
=poll4 (1)(2)(3)(4)      Makes a poll with 4 option
=hug [@user]       Places random gif and hugs
=cat            Please dont spam this or it wont work
=dog          Please dont spam this or it wont work
=urban (1-2 word)     Searches the definition on urban dictionary
=report @user message    Sends a report. Requires a channel called "reported"
=badges (@user)    shows the badges for developers
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
=rps                          Rock, Papers, and Sissors!
=fortnite (name)              shows off users fortnite scores
=d6                           Rolls a dice that is 6 sided  
=snowball [@user]             Try and throw a snowball
=fidget-spinner               What a good waste of time
=8ball (question)             Ask a question
=Jail [@user]                 Puts jail bars over there icon
=continued [@user]            Puts to be continued over there icon
=flipit (text)                Flips and reverse the text
=meme       welcome to the internet
=dadjoke        Gives a dadjoke
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.comment: Fishing System! Hopefully you enjoy this fishing system, Please let me know of your feedback! - System Created by GamingFlaming

actions.comment: Help Command.
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
=fish start - Go fishing in the channel the command is done.
=fish - for this fish command.
=fish info @user - See status about a user.

**Server Releated Commands**
=fish serverinfo - See server releated fishing status.

actions.message: Hello and welcome to my store ${tempVars("user")}! Hopefully you are able to find everything you need to help you on you're fishing adventures...
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
The basics needed to fish!
**Bait $70** - We all need bait here and then to catch fish!. =fishshop bait
**Fishing Line $270** - It's needed to even catch them. =fishshop fishline
**License $500** - You need a fishing License to operate. One free net included =fishshop license
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Extras to help you fish!
**Level 1 Net $150** - Upgrade how much you can store! Up to 3 fish. =fishshop net1
**Level 2 Net $550** - Now you can store up to 6 fish at once! =fishshop net2
**Level 3 Net $800** - Now you can store up to 10 fish at once! =fishshop net3
**Sell** - Sell fish to me! Can sell up to 3 fish per day as per fish market regulations in the bot we have!
*To sell fish do =fishshop sell to sell fish, Note, I'll buy all fish that you stored!
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: ${member} Please Specify a member to annoy, Annoy [@user]
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Hey, ${member} Loves you very much, and he sent me to annoy you.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I am a keen mountain-biker, and was the proud owner of a fairly expensive mountain bike. My bike was fitted with V brakes, which are extremely effective, though prone to squealing. My dear brother decided to have a ride on my bike one day, while I was out. He noticed the squealing as he cycled down the hill we live on, towards the invariably busy crossroads at the bottom. Being a helpful sort, he headed back home and proceeded to pour a generous amount of 3-in-1 oil onto the brakes, before once more setting off down the hill. The oil worked! The only reported squealing came from my brother, as he slammed into the side of a moving VW Beetle. To this day he sports an impressive scar running from his eye socket to just past his ear.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Does the FAL one shot?

Is the MK17 the best gun?

Does the MK48 do more damage than the M16?

Does the machine gun use M14 ammo?

Can I store powerups in the fanny pack?

Do the cars drop loot?

I found a blood bag in the church!

Why isn't there snipers?

Why isn't the Mosin a one shot?

Do the shotguns one shot?

Do I drop the Makarov?

Did someone blow up Bump Flatts?

Is there snipers?

Can you use the crossbow?

Can the machine guns headshot?

How do I ADS?
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: s  s!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: T     s.    ss   .      T  s.  x  s   ss . ! s!  s s    s  ! s s    .
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: I sexually Identify as an Attack Helicopter. Ever since I was a boy I dreamed of soaring over the oilfields dropping hot sticky loads on disgusting foreigners. People say to me that a person being a helicopter is Impossible and I'm fucking retarded but I don't care, I'm beautiful. I'm having a plastic surgeon install rotary blades, 30 mm cannons and AMG-114 Hellfire missiles on my body. From now on I want you guys to call me "Apache" and respect my right to kill from above and kill needlessly. If you can't accept me you're a heliphobe and need to check your vehicle privilege. Thank you for being so understanding.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Bank Help commands, See list below to use the bank system.

actions.message:
=freecash - Earn Free money from the bank. 
=bank close - Close your bank account.
=bank balance - Show your bank balance.

**Advertisement: Need quick loans? At Loan Bank, We can help!, Take out any of are loans that we currently offer! Best of all, you don't need to pay us back right away**
See =loans Help - command for info.
*we hope you don't read this small print, can only take out one loan, Loan's may prevent you from playing certian minigames and or buying stuff.*
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
*Limited Time offers from the bank which include a investment.*

=bank invest1 - Invest into a bussiness and earn back 1,000 between 5,000 money

*More to be set later*

=bank close - Close the bank and let users that run the bank command know.
*note: Money earned by minigames and or shops will still work*
=bank open - Opens the bank up from being closed.
=bank setmoneyjoin - Set the default money when users join.

!mayor taxlow - Sets the tax rate to low.
!mayor taxmedium - Set's the tax rate to medium
!mayor taxhigh - Set's the tax rate to high.
!mayor transfer - Transfer money from the goverment bank account to your's.
!mayor info - Brings up this helpful information tab.
!mayor lockdown

=mayor cheatmoney - Steal some of the goverment's money into your own bank account *Don't tell anyone though.*
=mayor addmoney - add's $1000 to the goverrment's bank account.
=mayor unlock - Unlocks a lockdown set by the mayor.

actions.message:
${tempVars("user")} has raided you. It's possible money printers and money have been stolen. Check your base status with !base info
If you bought security, the security may be gone too same with the barricades.

**Also, You're base is on cooldown for 4 hours, to protect against any other raids.** If your base is in debt and or has little to no money, It will not be raided**
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: **Raid Over** Cooldown in effect for base. Cooldown for this command is now set for 1 hour.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: This base is currently on cooldown, Try another base.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Hello!**

I see you have used the base command, but you did not specify the correct param.
Here is what you can do

**Help**
=base setup - Setup a base on the server.
=base buyprinter - Buy a Money Printer to use in your base to make money.
=base buysecurity - Buy a security team to be used once in a raid.
=raid - Raid a user's base, do raid @usermention to use. Cooldown 2 hours.

=base transfer - Transfer the money printers current overall balance to your bank account. **Won't work if mayor has lockdown in effect**
=base info - Do base info @usermention, Show's all status about the user's base. **Hopefully you won't try and use that to pick the good bases to raid hah**
or just do =base info without a usermention to get your own status

base printstart - Start's Printers, Note, You will not get a message but the printers will start, check !base info to see.
base buybarricade - Buy a barricade to help protect your base!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: Checks to see if user did a param, If not show message. Basically a help menu.
actions.name: Comment

actions.comment: Storing Param and other member releated stuff.
actions.name: Comment

actions.comment: End of Storeing lol :D
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
**Setup a base**
We found a old warehouse where you can setup the base there. See the help with =base for command info.

**Tasks**
Buy a money printer.
Cash out the money printer.
Build Defense (one time use per raid)
Raid Other's
Buy Security Guard's (one time use per raid)

We wish you good luck! To see your base status do =base baseinfo
actions.name: Send Message

Welcome ${tempVars("username")} to the printer dealer. Let me check you're bank account before we contiune...

actions.message:
Good... You got enough. Here's the contract, We will attempt to protect you're base from a raid attack for one time use though.
Then we have to get out of there before are boss comes back from his coffee break. Though you can re-hire us again to protect you again.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: Barricade Command Shop.
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
Welcome ${tempVars("username")} to the Barricade Shop. Let me check you're bank account before we contiune...
We can help you barricade your base from theives and raiders.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
It appears the bank has rejected the order. **Error: Not enough money**
Please put more money in the bank then come back.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Great! The order went through and the bank accepted. We will get to work barricadeing your base. This should hold up one time and can be re-bought after each raid.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
**Welcome to the setup wizard for giveaways!**
I'll ask you a few choices and then the giveaway will be created!

**Once a giveaway is made, it can not be stopped early!**
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Giveaway Help Setup!

Please list the info below (**In order**)
Title 
Number of Winners - **Number Only - 5 max**
Giveaway Time - **In minutes**
Channel - Where to send the giveaway to? use a #channel
Description - **Enter in the Description of the giveaway.**

Example:
*giveaway create ExampleTitle 2 60 #giveaways Want to win an example text? Enter in today!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Giveaway Created!** 

Channel: ${mentionedChannel}
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
${tempVars("Description")}



**To enter do !giveaway enter to enter into the giveaway!**
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
Ends in ${serverVars("giveawaytime")} minutes
Winners: ${tempVars("numberofwinners")}
actions.name: Set Embed Footer
